page.title: 02Home life - Jenny
page.content: On a typical school day I get up at 7:30am. I get dressed and have my breakfast of ricicles, toast and a drink of tea and watch Brakfast Time on television. At 8:30 mum takes William, Wendy and me to school in the car. At 3:45pm I come home from school and let Tim out of the kennel and give him a bowl of water and take him for a walk. I take him just over the motorway bridge and back again. I watch television until tea time when I have chips and baked beans. After tea I go and do my violin and clarinet practice for half an hour. Then I get Mum to help me with my spellings and tables and hear me read. If it is a lovely day Dad and I go for a bike ride with Tim. When I come back I have a drink and something to eat.
